member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.ColorData
member.summary: Gets an array of color data that represents the final packed texture. Array is in top-to-bottom order with pixels reading left-to-right.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Palette
member.summary: Gets an array of coor data the represents the palette of colors used in the Aseprite document.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.TextureWidth
member.summary: Gets the width, in pixels, of the final packed texture.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.TextureHeight
member.summary: Gets the height, in pixels, of the final packed texture.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Animations
member.summary: Gets the collection of defined animations, with the dictionary key being the name of the animation.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Frames
member.summary: Gets the collection of frames.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Slices
member.summary: Gets the collection of defined slices, with the dictionary key being the name of the slice.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.TrySquareRoot(System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Given a value, performs the square root operation on it and returns back if the square root is a perfect square root. The value of will the the integer value of the square root (rounded down).
member.param: The value to attempt to square root.
An integer in which to store the result of the square root, as an integer. If the square root is not a perfect root, then the value of this will be the integer value of the result rounded down.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.TryDivision(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Performs integer division using the values given in the form of / . If the result of the division is an integer with no remainder, the a value of true is returned. The result of the division is stored in the .
member.param: The value on the left side of the division symbol.
The value on the right side of the division symbol.
The result of the division as an integer.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Frame.X
member.summary: The x-coordinate position of the frame relative to the final color data.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Frame.Y
member.summary: The y-coordinate position of the frame relative to the final color data.

member.summary: The width, in pixels, of the frame.

member.summary: The height, in pixels, of the frame.

member.summary: The duration, in seconds, of the frame.

member.summary: The name of the animation.

member.summary: The starting frame of the animation.

member.summary: The ending frame of the animation.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Animation.Color
member.summary: The color of the animation as defined as the tag color in Asperite.

member.name: F:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteProcessorResult.Animation.Direction
member.summary: A value that indicates the direction the animation is played in. 0 = Forward, 1 = Reverse, 2 = Ping Pong.

member.name: T:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader
member.summary: A implementations used for reading the contents of a .ase/.aseprite file.

member.name: P:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.LastChunkRead
member.summary: Gets or Sets the last that was read.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a new instance.
member.param: The stream to read from.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.ReadWORD
member.summary: Reads a 2-byte (16-bit) unsigned integer from the current stream using little-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by two bytes.
member.returns: A (2-byte) (16-bit) unsigned integer read from the current stream.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.ReadSHORT
member.summary: Reads a 2-byte (16-bit) signed integer from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream by two bytes.
member.returns: A 2-byte (16-bit) signed integer read from the current stream.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.ReadDWORD
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte (32-bit) unsigned integer from the current stream and advances the position of the stream by four bytes.
member.returns: A 4-byte (32-bit) unsigned integer read from this stream.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.ReadLONG
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte (32-bit) signed integer from the current stream and advances the position of the stream by four bytes.
member.returns: A 4-byte (32-bit) signed integer read from this stream.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.ReadString
member.summary: Reads a string from the current stream and advances the position of the stream by the total number of bytes in the string read.
member.returns: A string read from this stream.

member.name: M:MonoGame.Aseprite.ContentPipeline.AsepriteReader.Ignore(System.Int32)
member.summary: Advances the position of the stream by the total number of bytes given, ignoring the data contined within the skiped part of the stream.
member.param: THe total number of bytes to skip over in the stream.
